subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Cristiano Ronaldo scored twice to lead Real Madrid to a 3-1 win at its archrival Barcelona and secure a spot in the Copa del Rey final, 4-2, on aggregate.
snippet: Cristiano Ronaldo scored twice to lead Real Madrid to a 3-1 win at its archrival Barcelona and secure a spot in the Copa del Rey final, 4-2, on aggregate.
